title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. XIX, pt. 420 - Privacy Of Consumer Financial And Health Information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. XIX, pt. 420 - Privacy Of Consumer Financial And Health Information

State Regulations

General Provisions (§ 420.0 to 420.3)

Privacy and Opt Out Notices for Financial Information (§ 420.4 to 420.9)

Limits on Disclosure of Financial Information (§ 420.10 to 420.12)

Exceptions to Limits on Disclosure of Financial Information (§ 420.13 to 420.16)

Rules for Health Information (§ 420.17 to 420.21)

Additional Provisions (§ 420.22 to 420.25)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. XIX, pt. 420

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 1505, 1608, 1712, 3217, art. 24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
